review: **** ******* very friendly and explains everything in detail. Can consult for any neurological issues or Diabetes mellitus
Dr Vijay is very friendly and his explanation about the treatment is crisp and clear. He is patient centric doc!
Waiting time should be reduced as Practo charges are twice that of walk in consultation fee. Doctor and other facilities are upto the mark.

Doctor explained my condition very well and also find out the root cause for my condition. Very satisfied with the treatment and explanation provided.  I would highly recommend this doctor.
Only point i would mention here is that practo appointment time will not guarantee you doctor visit on that book time slot. It may take 1-2 hours more based on rush. So recommend you to go early and inform your presence at the reception.

I had visited the doctor by looking at the practo feedback for the problem of feeling very mild numbness in right side palm(part of) and below the right side feet. He checked me in first visit and suggested for a nerve test. I have done the test (outside of the hospital) and went to the doctor for showing the reports and reviewing it. He asked me few questions and answered to him, and i clearly explained about my neck problem and about vertigo during my first as well as the second (recent) visit. I know what i had gone through for the neck problem for nearly 5 years, and i knew too that what pain i had gone through to come out of it. Coming to the recent second visit, doctor was doing some test on my neck, bending the neck left and right (using good amount of force) and asking me that any pain, i said no pain but getting mild giddiness, doctor replied that "no pain even after doing this much" and he did it one more time. Finally, he prescribed few tablets and i came out of the hospital after paying 400 as consultation charges (though practo says 300). After i came out, was feeling giddy and definitely felt that my neck got disturbed. I was really worried for this, and as i mentioned in earlier that i had visited several doctors including the physiotherapists, none of the doctor had done this kind of testing (bending the neck with tight force) to me even after i mentioned that i have a neck problem and giddiness. After going home also it was troubling me, and i am feeling really sorry of myself why i went there for consultation? Once again i know what i had gone through to get rid of problems because of neck, now i dont know how many days i have to go through this.

Thank you.

We waited almost 2 hrs still was not able to meet the doctor.. my appointment was booked at 7.30 and we waited till 10 even aftr such long wait doctor dint meet us and we were asked to wait a little more. Patient was my father who is 73 yrs old he waited thr so long witout having food and scheduled medicine jus to meet doctor but all went futile. Very awful experience and suggest the doctor to intervene such cases and take proper action so that in future other patients would not face the same problem.

I would say doctor is wow .His patience and caring words  will makes us feel comfortable and better.Actually we went for my mom having some age related issues he took utmost care and elaborated everything in his soothing tone.I would highly recommend this doctor . Big hatsoff to the whole team

Visited for my mother neuro related problem excellent and friendly doctor gives ample time to listen your problem, you can reach doctor on whatsapp also.

Highly recommended and my mother is on medication ans she is feeling better than earlier will post further details.

Thanks Dr. Vijay
